title: Do Riot employees watch LCS?
body:
So, I was wondering, do many Rioters out there watch lcs? Is every LCS match analysed by someone watching the game to make sure it went smooth etc?

ALSO, is it just me or is KOBE a crap shoutcaster. Like I don't know if I'm biased or not. But he is terrible. Every thing that comes out of his mouth either wastes our time listening or is just stupid.. The other shoutcasters just have to agree with him and laugh. It's awkward and a waste of time.. EVERYTHING HE SAYS.
